tool_description: Verifies current employment status, tenure, and salary information through employer contact and database checks.

employee_name.description: Full name of the employee to verify

hire_date.description: Reported hire date in ISO format

error_messages: Employer not found: Unable to locate or contact the specified employer
Employee verification failed: Employee not found in employer records
Salary mismatch: Reported salary differs significantly from employer records
Employment status unclear: Unable to confirm current active employment
Invalid hire date: Hire date format incorrect or unrealistic
usage: Provide employer_name, employee_name, job_title, hire_date, and stated_salary for verification. The tool will attempt employer contact and database lookups to verify employment details.

tenure_months.description: Number of months employed at current position

salary_verified.description: Whether stated salary matches employer records

employment_type.description: Type of employment (full_time, part_time, contract, temporary)

verification_method.description: How verification was accomplished (direct_contact, database, third_party)
